chapter.title: Maven and RESTEasy
chapter.para: JBoss's Maven Repository is at: http://repository.jboss.org/maven2
Here's the pom.xml fragment to use. Please relase 1.0-beta-9 with the current Resteasy version you want to use.
Please download the RESTEasy JAX-RS source and view our testsuite. Everything is done in maven and we use our Embedded JAX-RS Container to do our testing.
